Container.Description: Nessus was built from the ground-up with a deep understanding of how security practitioners work. Every feature in Nessus is designed to make vulnerability assessment simple, easy and intuitive. The result: less time and effort to assess, prioritize, and remediate issues. To fully configure Nessus Professional you will need to provide your License Key/Linking Key, admin username, and admin password. In the settings below you can set your admin username, password, and license/linking key. [br][br] Additional parameters and available options can be found on Steve McGrath's docker hub page: https://hub.docker.com/r/stevemcgrath/nessus_scanner and can be configured via the Extra Parameters section in advanced view.
